items.headline: Fed’s Waller backs a series of interest-rate cuts over the next six months
items.summary_en: Federal Reserve governor Christopher Waller on Thursday said he now supports a series of interest-rate cuts beginning in September, with the pace of subsequent moves driven by the incoming data.
